abilities.name: Uul-Netol Earthquake
about: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration.

abilities.name: Bone Nova
about: Creates a barrage of projectiles in a circle

abilities.name: Cleave
about: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them

abilities.name: Breach Pillar
about: Spawns a breach pillar that once passed through spawns monsters
